TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Instance extends System.Object implements class System.Management.Instrumentation.IInstance
Public MustInherit Class Instance Implements IInstance

summary.span: 代表已知為管理檢測執行個體類別的衍生類別。

span.span: Represents derived classes known to be management instrumentation instance classes.

summary.span: 這些衍生的類別繼承 的實作，可讓執行個體透過 屬性發行。

span.span: These derived classes inherit an implementation of that allows instances to be published through the property.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別建構函式來初始化此類型中的狀態會呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Published { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出實作這個介面的類別執行個體是否可以經由管理檢測顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether instances of classes that implement this interface are visible through management instrumentation.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出實作這個介面的類別執行個體是否可以經由管理檢測顯示。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether instances of classes that implement this interface are visible through management instrumentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true`如果執行個體是透過 management instrumentation;否則， `false``true`, if the instance is visible through management instrumentation; otherwise, `false` ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
